hero_description: We are happy to help you.
hero_background_alt: Photo of a person typing on a keyboard
input_error_1: Please write a message so we can start a fruitful collaboration.
input_error_2: Please provide your name so we know how to address you.
input_error_3: Please provide your email address so we can get in touch.

input_error_5: Please check the correctness of the email address.
input_error_6: You can provide your phone number, but it is not required.
